Title: I love Peking's Tien An Men
Publisher: Shaanxi renmin chubanshe (陕西人民出版社)
Notes: Three children with a drawing of a boy flying towards Tian'anmen. They are in a 'cave dwelling' in Yan'an, see the pagoda in the background. The poster in the background is Study Pan Dongzi to become good children of the party, 1975.The poster, published for export purposes, has captions in English (hence the 'Tien An Men' in the title), German, French and Chinese.
Theme: New Year Prints (and chubby babies)Pan Dongzi
